title: French toast with onions
ingredients: ['100g rindless smoked back bacon, chopped', '2 tbsp vegetable oil', '500g onions, thinly sliced', 'pinch of sugar', '2 eggs', '3 tbsp single cream', '4 fresh chives, snipped', '4 thick slices stale white bread, crusts removed', '15g butter, softened', '30g Gruy√®re, grated', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'flat-leaf parsley to garnish (optional)']
